name: Ball Physics
description:
Push the ball in a direction by touching it.The objective of the game is that the ball should not cross the game screen boundaries by giving it different directions.If the ball crosses the game screen boundary the game gets finished and the time from the first touch to the ball till the ball crosses the screen boundary is displayed.The time is displayed in seconds.Try to play for a longer time.The highest time can be seen from the HIGHEST TIME option.

Strategy-

Touch the circumference of the ball.

Try to play end to end.
